text: The Garden of Aunt Isabel (Spanish: El jardín de la tía Isabel) is a 1971 Mexican movie directed by Felipe Cazals. It stars Jorge Martínez de Hoyos, Claudio Brook, Ofelia Guilmáin, Gregorio Casal, Alfonso Arau, Claudio Obregón, Aarón Hernánn and was distributed by Películas Mexicanas,Luis Del Rio Santoyo. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Mexican movies Category:Movies directed by Felipe Cazals Category:Movies set in the 16th century
title: The Garden of Aunt Isabel
